high_descs: Take a step forward and face the desk on the left.
Pick up the statue in the center of the desk.
Carry the statue and take two steps left, just passed the desk.
Hold the statue up and turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Hold a statue and turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Walk a few feet forward then turn left and approach the wooden desk
Pick up the figurine from the desk
Turn left and walk to the lamp on the left side of the desk
Turn on the lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine the figurine under light of the desk lamp

high_descs: Walk towards the wall, then turn left toward the desk.
Pick up the statue on the desk.
Turn all the way around, then turn right toward the wall. Walk toward the wall, then turn right and walk toward the window. Raise the statue up toward the top of the desk hutch.
anns.task_desc: Take the statue off the desk, raise the statue up at the height of the desk hutch.
